tool_description: Netflix data API provides details, stats and information of TV shows, movies, series, documentaries and more.
name: Netflix_v2
title: Netflix

api_list.name: Season Episodes

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Season IDs (you can separate with commas)

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netflix54.p.rapidapi.com/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflix54.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://netflix54.p.rapidapi.com/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflix54.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
